entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 12:31 AM EST Sunday 12 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: ENE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:58 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
